seed_pair.target: No hay problema. Todo está bien.
Eso es muy amable de tu parte y estoy agradecido a ti por ayudar.
seed_pair.known: That's very kind of you and I'm grateful to you for helping.

seed_pair.target: Es la misma cosa de la que estábamos hablando antes.
seed_pair.known: It's the same thing as we were talking about earlier.

seed_pair.target: Me desperté más temprano de lo que quería esta mañana.
seed_pair.known: I woke earlier than I wanted to this morning.
Why are you not happy any more?

seed_pair.target: Nada parece estar funcionando desde que intentamos arreglarlo.
seed_pair.known: Nothing seems to be working since we tried to fix it.

seed_pair.target: Ella era muy amable cuando me vio sintiéndome nervioso.
seed_pair.known: She was very kind when she saw me feeling nervous.

seed_pair.target: Él no era muy paciente cuando no pude responder.
seed_pair.known: He wasn't very patient when I couldn't answer.

seed_pair.target: Esto no es muy difícil, entonces espero que termines pronto.
seed_pair.known: This isn't very difficult, so I hope you'll finish soon.
Can you tell me what your name is?
